item.title: 日本为美国关税带来的进一步痛苦做好准备，承诺提供支持
item.description: 日本经济大臣表示，日本将根据需要 "毫不犹豫 "地采取额外行动，缓解美国关税对汽车行业的影响。【原文：Japan will take additional action to ease the impact of US tariffs on the auto sector as needed and “without hesitation,” its economy minister says.】

item.title: 印度股市有望延续七月连胜势头，表现优于全球同行
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 孙正义准备从软银内部挑选继任者
item.description: 孙正义表示，他计划将软银集团公司的管理权移交给技术和电信集团内部的某个人，以解决投资者和业务合作伙伴最关心的问题。【原文：Masayoshi Son said he plans to hand over the reins of SoftBank Group Corp. to someone within the technology and telecom group, addressing what may be the single biggest concern among investors and business partners.】

item.title: 受益于国内经济增长和关税优势，印度盈利表现将优于中国
item.description: 与中国企业相比，印度企业对下一个财报季更加乐观。【原文：Indian companies are inspiring more optimism than their Chinese rivals for next earnings season.】

item.title: 沃尔玛支持的 Flipkart 利用视频和直播吸引印度网购者
item.description: 沃尔玛公司旗下的电子商务巨头 Flipkart India Pvt.【原文：Flipkart India Pvt., the e-commerce giant owned by Walmart Inc., is using social videos and livestreams to convert young consumers spending a lot of time on their smartphones into loyal customers.】

item.title: 新台币自 2022 年以来首次升破 1 美元兑 29 新台币
item.description: 台币兑美元汇率攀升至三年多来最强劲的水平，给岛内依赖出口的经济和有大量外汇风险敞口的人寿保险公司带来压力。【原文：The Taiwan dollar climbed to the strongest in more than three years against the greenback, pressuring the island’s export reliant economy and life insurers with large foreign-exchange exposures.】

item.title: 韩国正在权衡美国增加国防开支的要求
item.description: 韩国正在与美国就提高国防开支进行谈判，这是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的一项重要要求，因为他呼吁盟国增加安全开支，减轻美国的负担。【原文：South Korea is in talks with the US about raising its defense spending, a key demand of President Donald Trump as he calls on allies to ramp up their outlays on security and lessen the burden on the US.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税，中国工业利润大幅下滑
item.description: 中国工业企业的利润创下自 10 月份以来的最大降幅，表明受美国提高关税和持续通缩压力影响的经济疲软。【原文：China’s industrial firms saw their profits drop the most since October, illustrating weakness in an economy strained by higher US tariffs and lingering deflationary pressure.】

item.title: 日本养老金避开债券，将 57% 的基金用于另类资产
item.description: 日本一度保守的养老基金正在将更多现金投入另类资产，以提高收益。一家公司的资金经理将这一做法提升到了一个全新的高度。【原文：Japan’s once conservative pension funds are putting more of their cash in alternative assets to push up returns. One corporate money manager has taken that to a whole new level.】

item.title: 东京电子摆脱中国竞争对手追赶的担忧
item.description: 日本东京电子有限公司（Tokyo Electron Ltd.）的负责人表示，尽管中国政府正在调动数十亿美元的资金追赶，但该公司仍将扩大其在中国芯片工具制造商中的领先优势。【原文：Tokyo Electron Ltd. is on course to widen its lead against Chinese chip tool makers despite the billions of dollars Beijing is mobilizing to catch up, according to the Japanese company’s chief.】

item.title: 价值 330 亿美元的中国医药财富几天内神秘崩塌
item.description: 当区逸杰的纸面身价达到 330 亿美元时，他并不在香港的办公室里。【原文：When Yat-Gai Au was worth $33 billion on paper, he wasn’t in his Hong Kong office.】

item.title: 中东停战导致需求萎缩，黄金周线收跌
item.description: 在以色列和伊朗之间的停火抑制了避险需求之后，黄金连续第二周下跌。【原文：Gold headed for its second consecutive weekly loss, after a ceasefire between Israel and Iran dented demand for havens.】

item.title: 日本股市因美联储降息希望而反弹，日经指数触及 40,000 点
item.description: 日本股市追随华尔街的涨势而上涨，原因是美国降息的希望得到巩固，而且中美两国最终达成了贸易谅解。日经指数自 1 月份以来首次突破 40,000 点大关。【原文：Japanese stocks rose tracking Wall Street’s gains as hopes of US interest rate cuts solidified and after US and China finalized a trade understanding. The Nikkei benchmark rose past the 40,000 mark for the first time since January.】

item.title: 气温飙升，中国煤炭市场暂时复苏
item.description: 随着夏季高温的到来，中国煤炭市场开始了季节性反弹，价格出现了试探性上涨。【原文：The Chinese coal market has begun its seasonal rebound with a tentative increase in prices as the summer heat arrives in earnest.】

item.title: 灵活运用 60/40 法宝的基金成为印度投资者的最爱
item.description: 上个月，通过将股票与债券和黄金等资产相结合实现内在多样化的印度基金吸引的资金一年来首次超过了纯股票型基金，这表明长期投资可能发生转变。【原文：Indian funds that offer built-in diversification by combining stocks with assets such as bonds and gold lured in more money than pure equity ones last month for the first time in a year, pointing toward a potential long-term investment shift.】

item.title: 冯德莱恩表示，如果美国贸易谈判破裂，欧盟将做好准备
item.description: 乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）在与欧盟领导人讨论了特朗普白宫的最新提议后表示，欧盟已为与美国的贸易谈判中可能出现的所有情况做好了准备，包括谈判破裂。【原文：The European Union is prepared for all eventualities in its trade negotiations with the US, including for a breakdown in talks, Ursula von der Leyen said, after discussing the latest proposals from the Trump White House with the bloc’s leaders.】

item.title: 大选前能源成本下降，东京通胀放缓
item.description: 随着能源价格涨势放缓，以及市政府在全国大选前免除了部分家庭水费，东京的通货膨胀率四个月来首次放缓。【原文：Inflation in Tokyo slowed for the first time in four months as energy price gains eased and the municipal government waived some water charges for households ahead of a national election likely to center on the cost-of-living crunch.】

item.title: 石油在动荡一周结束时保持稳定，焦点转向关税问题
item.description: 本周的焦点从中东冲突转移到美国关税谈判和华盛顿可能放松对伊朗的制裁上，在这一周的尾声，石油市场保持稳定。【原文：Oil was steady at the tail-end of a momentous week, with focus shifting from the conflict in the Middle East to US tariff negotiations and the potential easing of Washington’s sanctions on Iran.】

item.title: 阿联酋石油合作伙伴在意外减少供应后面临贸易损失
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国出人意料地削减了出售给包括英国石油公司（BP Plc）和道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）在内的项目合作伙伴的一种关键石油等级的数量，这将使一些交易账簿受到影响。【原文：An unexpected move by the United Arab Emirates to cut volumes of a key oil grade sold to project partners including BP Plc and TotalEnergies SE is set to put a dent in some trading books.】

item.title: Palantir 以 1 亿美元的初创公司交易拥抱核能
item.description: 帕兰蒂尔科技公司（Palantir Technologies Inc.【原文：The US will need more nuclear power as it enters into greater competition with China, said Mike Gallagher, head of defense at Palantir Technologies Inc.】

item.title: 美联储减息押注势头强劲，股市再创新高：市场综述
item.description: 周四，全球股市指数触及纪录高位，地缘政治担忧平息，美联储今年降息预期增强，亚洲股市将继续上扬。【原文：Asian stocks were set to advance after a gauge of global equities touched a record high Thursday on calming geopolitical concerns and increased expectations for Federal Reserve rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 基金抢滩科技债券，中国信贷 ETF 几乎翻番
item.description: 随着越来越多的基金经理制定投资新兴科技相关债券市场的策略，中国企业债券交易所交易基金的数量将增加近一倍，达到 21 只。【原文：The number of corporate bond exchange-traded funds in China is set to almost double to 21 as a growing number of money managers draw up strategies to invest in the fledgling tech-related bond market.】

item.title: 斯塔默放宽福利削减，预算和他的权威受到打击
item.description: 基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）同意削减造成分歧的 50 亿英镑（约合 69 亿美元）福利开支，以平息本党的反叛，这一决定很可能使英国的财政计划和首相本人的领导力都需要修复。【原文：Keir Starmer agreed to pare back a divisive £5 billion ($6.9 billion) cut to welfare to quiet a rebellion by his own party, a decision that will likely leave both Britain’s fiscal plans and the prime minister’s own leadership in need of repair.】

item.title: 谷歌聘请甲骨文公司云计算首席财务官领导云计算财务工作
item.description: Alphabet 公司从甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）挖来了新的云财务主管，加深了行业内的潜在竞争。【原文：Alphabet Inc. has plucked its new cloud finance chief from Oracle Corp., deepening a potential rivalry in the industry.】

item.title: Skechers 在罕见的收购融资中举债 60 多亿美元
item.description: 鞋类制造商斯凯奇美国公司（Skechers USA Inc.【原文：Footwear maker Skechers USA Inc. priced more than $6 billion in debt on Thursday to support its buyout by 3G Capital, in a sizable deal that showed how eager leveraged finance buyers are for any debt supporting a large merger or acquisition.】

item.title: 穆迪以暂停实施财政规则为由下调哥伦比亚评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将哥伦比亚的信用评级下调至 Baa3，理由是其债务负担不断加重，并决定暂停限制政府借贷的财政规则。【原文：Moody’s Ratings downgraded Colombia’s credit score to Baa3, citing the worsening debt burden and the decision to suspend the fiscal rule which curbed government borrowing.】

item.title: 阿根廷科尔多瓦省向海外出售 7.25 亿美元债务
item.description: 阿根廷科尔多瓦省周四向固定收益投资者抛售固定收益债券，这是哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统 2023 年底上任以来阿根廷地方政府首次出售国际债券。【原文：Argentina’s Cordoba Province tapped fixed-income investors Thursday in the country’s first international debt sale by a local government since President Javier Milei took office in late 2023.】

item.title: 欧盟向意见分歧的领导人介绍特朗普的关税反建议
item.description: 在乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）通报情况后，欧盟领导人正在讨论他们对唐纳德-特朗普总统最新贸易提议的回应。【原文：European Union leaders are discussing their response to President Donald Trump’s latest proposal on trade after a briefing from Ursula von der Leyen.】

item.title: 纽约时报》称，优步正在洽谈资助卡兰尼克收购小马哥人工智能部门的事宜
item.description: 据《纽约时报》报道，优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.两家公司的股票在周四的交易中都出现了大涨。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is in talks with founder Travis Kalanick to help fund his acquisition of the US arm of Chinese self-driving firm Pony AI Inc., the New York Times reported. Shares of both companies jumped in Thursday trading.】

item.title: 人工智能正在改变编码技术，无论好坏
item.description: 人工智能工具正在简化软件开发流程，并改变着编码员的含义。但首先...【原文：AI tools are streamlining the software development process and changing what it means to be a coder. But first…】
